nodes.text: Star Wars Episode I Who's Who: A Pocket Guide to the Characters of The Phantom Menace
Star Wars Episode I Who's Who: A Pocket Guide to Characters of the Phantom Menace is a small book which provides information about the characters in the film, The Phantom Menace.

A long time ago in a galaxy far, far away, a boy named Anakin Skywalker dreamed of leaving his desert home to become a brave Jedi Knight. . . . Now the early adventures of Anakin and Obi-Wan Kenobi come to life in this pocket guide to George Lucas' Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace!

Inside you'll find familiar faces such as R2-D2, Yoda, and Jabba the Hutt. You'll also meet for the first time the new heroes and villains—from Qui-Gon Jinn and Jar Jar Binks to Nute Gunray and Darth Sidious—who populate The Phantom Menace. With 50 biographies accompanied by photographs, Episode I Who's Who is a perfect introduction to the first chapter in the unfolding Star Wars saga.
